Header.title: Tenta Wine
Header.paragraph: Hand selected sustainable wine collections from the Barolo area in Italy.

About.paragraph1: For our customers we select outstanding, sustainably produced and yet to be discovered wines from the northern Italian region of Piedmont. As sustainability and the bio-dynamic production of wines is critical for us, we visit the vineyards we represent multiple times and establish excellent working relations with the winemakers. This is to make sure the standards we set on the wines, are met, and we can stand behind them.
About.paragraph2: The finest wines we discover then make it into our “Tasting Collections”. A great variety of the chosen wines are only purchasable locally or regionally, and haven’t had a possibility to travel the world. This is why, with Tenta, you not only receive a one of a kind wine experience, but are also supporting sustainable, young, and lesser known winemakers.

Features.title: Personal Wine Delivery
Features.text: Get your wines from Piemonte delivered world wide.
